enb_long_title: Twenty-Fourth sessions of the Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) of the UNFCCC and First session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol (AWG) and related meetings
sentences: Informal consultations were held in the morning and afternoon before the contact group reconvened in the evening.
Discussions focused on a bracketed paragraph on next steps and how best to facilitate interactive dialogue between parties, research programmes and the IPCC.

In the paragraph, SBSTA agrees to explore how to facilitate dialogue between parties and research programmes, invites submission of views to be considered by SBSTA 26, asks the Secretariat to organize an informal discussion at SBSTA 26(i nviting representatives of research programmes and the IPCC), and notes that consideration should be given to a workshop on research needs by SBSTA 28.
The draft conclusions were finally agreed on Monday night and will be forwarded to SBSTA for its consideration.
